matches.lesson_id: Initiating and Managing GIS Work Orders
matches.reason: Demonstrates opening GIS design, taking ownership, refreshing conflicting data, and changing state to Proposed.

matches.lesson_id: Field Site Assessment and Verification
matches.reason: Reviews pole conditions using Street View, clearances, spans, tree trimming needs, and access classification.

matches.lesson_id: Reviewing Make-Ready Sheets and Field Documentation
matches.reason: Opens and reviews Excel make-ready sheet (GW-LENOX-6_ES), pole details, clearances, work types.

matches.lesson_id: Pole Location, Condition, and Attribute Management
matches.reason: Inspects pole attributes: ID, status Existing to Replace, height, town code, joint use, proposals.

matches.lesson_id: Anchor and Guy Wire Inspection and Editing
matches.reason: Updates anchored guy wires, lead length, guy size, ownership; rotates anchor icon.

matches.lesson_id: Pole Replacement Processes and Hardware Configurations
matches.reason: Replaces pole (35 to 45-2), down guy, riser; generates work records, adds CUs like CU-TOP.

matches.lesson_id: Riser Installations and UG to OH Service Connections
matches.reason: Handles SER-UGOH risers, UDSCC service connections, transfers, adds tags, foam seals.

matches.lesson_id: Compatible Units Selection and Cost Estimation
matches.reason: Adds CUs manually (TLA-CDLRECXFMR for drip loops), references CU List Excel.

matches.lesson_id: GIS Editing Tools and Object Verification
matches.reason: Verifies edits in object relationships, Navigator, Object Control Editor.

matches.lesson_id: Reviewing Field Survey and Make-Ready Data
matches.reason: Integrates Excel field survey/make-ready sheets, pole details, clearances.

matches.lesson_id: Editing Segments, Coordinates, Trails, and Base Elements
matches.reason: Edits trail geometry, segment lengths, bearings, coordinates in Point/Span Editor.

matches.lesson_id: Adding Map Elements, Labels, and Infrastructure Annotations
matches.reason: Adds north arrow, text boxes, legends, street labels, feeder annotations.

matches.lesson_id: Inserting and Managing Text Boxes for Construction Notes
matches.reason: Inserts/editing text boxes for notes, properties (font, alignment, color).

matches.lesson_id: Documenting Pole Replacements and Hardware Transfers
matches.reason: Details pole top replacements, transfers, clearances in text notes.

matches.lesson_id: Generating and Exporting EON Reports from STORMS
matches.reason: Generates EON Page 1/2, Telephone Page 1/2 reports from STORMS.

matches.lesson_id: Editing, Customizing, and Finalizing EON Documents
matches.reason: Combines PDFs, edits costs to zero, adds sketches, prepared by info.

matches.lesson_id: Dig Safe Tickets: Rules, When Required, and Grouping
matches.reason: Explains Dig Safe for digging (poles/anchors), grouping by streets/max 3 poles.

matches.lesson_id: Filling Dig Safe Data Capture Forms: Header, Location, and Work Details
matches.reason: Fills WR#, dept, location, pre-mark, description, excavation details.

matches.lesson_id: Municipal Water/Sewer Notifications and Town-Specific Requirements
matches.reason: Uses town list for water/sewer notifications (Dig Safe member, fax/call).

matches.lesson_id: Preparing Notice of Excavation (NOE) Forms
matches.reason: Fills NOE form: town/dept, contacts, scope, sketch from GIS.

matches.lesson_id: Customer Outage Lists: Criteria, Generation, and Examples
matches.reason: Generates outage lists via directional traces for risers/transformers.

matches.lesson_id: Environmental Review Checklist: Purpose, Process, and Header Completion
matches.reason: Fills checklist header: WO#, project, location, scope.

matches.lesson_id: Environmental Checklist: GIS Tools and Assessments
matches.reason: Uses MassMapper for wetlands/floodplains, GIS public data for wells.

matches.lesson_id: MassDOT State Highway Permits
matches.reason: Checks MassDOT inventory (green=permit), submits Smartsheet.

matches.lesson_id: Document Assembly, Organization, Sketches, and STORMS Compliance Tracking
matches.reason: Workaround for OneDrive sync: download from server Chrome, upload to STORMS.

matches.lesson_id: Attaching Documents and Managing STORMS Requirements
matches.reason: Attaches docs (sketches, DigSafe, EnvCheck), manages requirements (255, 840).

matches.lesson_id: Forestry Review and Design Approval Processes
matches.reason: Emails forestry for review (Rqmt 236), assigns Design Approval (278).

matches.lesson_id: Navigating STORMS Interface and Work Request Intake
matches.reason: Searches WRs, opens designs, takes ownership, changes state.

matches.lesson_id: Pre-Design Preparations: Dig Safe Tickets and Site Verification
matches.reason: Copies DigSafe form, fills WR#, location, pre-mark; verifies via Google Maps.

matches.lesson_id: Pole Inspection, Imaging, and GIS Updates
matches.reason: Reviews LCI images, updates pole status/height in GIS.

matches.lesson_id: Make-Ready Pole Analysis and Loading in O-Calc Pro
matches.reason: Loads poles in O-Calc (NESC 23), reviews assignments, PLDBIDs.

matches.lesson_id: Pole Design Edits: Hardware, Guys, Conductors, and Labor Adders
matches.reason: Edits pole hardware (PRISTS clamps), guys (GUY-3-105), adders (PLA-SAMEHOLE).

matches.lesson_id: Creating Construction Sketches, Plots, and Layouts
matches.reason: Adds construction plot, edits properties, sets scale, generates index.

matches.lesson_id: Cost Estimation, Billing, and Financial Configuration
matches.reason: Uses calculator for poles/PLAs/premarks, adds TPAG remarks in STORMS.

matches.lesson_id: Document Preparation, Standards Review, and PDF Assembly
matches.reason: Reviews standards (10-100), assembles PDFs (EON, sketches).

matches.lesson_id: Directional Traces, Exchange Notices, and Joint Ownership Forms
matches.reason: Runs directional traces for outages, generates EON forms.

matches.lesson_id: Final Submission, State Changes, and Workflow Completion
matches.reason: Exports PDFs to GIS server/OneDrive, changes design state complete.
